text: Timothy Sydney Robert Hardy, CBE, FSA (29 October 1925 - 3 August 2017) was an English television, movie, and stage actor. His career began in the 1959 movie Coriolanus. Hardy was born in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire on 29 October 1925.Robert Hardy Biography (1925-) He was married to Elizabeth Fox from 1952 until they divorced in 1956. He was later married to Sally Pearson from 1961 until they divorced in 1986.
